James is best known as a passionate and early supporter of [[Surrealism]], a movement that was born from the political uncertainty and upheaval between the wars. Rejecting the bourgeois' dominating rationality, surrealists escaped into a world of fantasy and irrationality. He sponsored [[Salvador DalÃ­]] for the whole of 1938 and his collection of paintings and art objects that subsequently came to be accepted as the finest collection of surrealist work in private hands. He also provided practical help, supporting DalÃ­ for about two years and allowed [[RenÃ© Magritte]] to stay in his London house to paint.
James is best known as a passionate and early supporter of [[Surrealism]], a movement that was born from the political uncertainty and upheaval between the wars. Rejecting the bourgeois' dominating rationality, surrealists escaped into a world of fantasy and irrationality. He sponsored [[Salvador DalÃ­]] for the whole of 1938 and his collection of paintings and art objects that subsequently came to be accepted as the finest collection of surrealist work in private hands. He also provided practical help, supporting DalÃ­ for about two years and allowed [[RenÃ© Magritte]] to stay in his London house to paint.
